results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-5bf875b79c-5kxrk

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-5bf875b79c-5kxrk], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find any ready pods to route traffic to; it expects 1 ready pod but finds none.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`.
3. Ensure pod is running and healthy.
4. Verify service and pod labels match.
